thread.title: Multiple blasts rock restive Nigerian city of Maiduguri
thread.title_full: Multiple blasts rock restive Nigerian city of Maiduguri | News24

author: news24.com
title: Multiple blasts rock restive Nigerian city of Maiduguri
text:
Maiduguri - Multiple explosions were heard Sunday on the outskirts of Maiduguri, a city in northeastern Nigeria that has repeatedly been attacked by Boko Haram Islamists, locals said.
They said loud explosions were heard from the areas of Kayamla and Dalori, three days after Maiduguri was attacked by the insurgents, leaving 10 dead and many more injured.
